name: Sick ATC
description:
Minimalist video game that emulates air traffic control radars, your objective is to manage the assigned airspace by giving instructions on speed, direction and altitude to the pilots of the planes that enter your sector to allow them to land, assigning permissions and turns, you You will also take care of the planes that take off, they need to leave in a specific direction above 10,000 feet.

As an indie developer it's my first game in unity, it's still in development, have fun, post your score in the pause menu and tell me your opinion please, thanks!
